title.rendered: New in Codefresh: Single-Sign-On, Custom Triggers, Cron Jobs, and More!

content.rendered:
We at Codefresh are constantly working to build the best Container Native CI/CD platform for you, our customers, and we have been especially busy lately prepping some very cool and innovative new features.

In our latest live webinar, our CTO Oleg Verhovsky shared the latest additions and improvements to the product.

You can watch each new feature in the video recordings below:

 

 

 

 

 

 

Have questions? Schedule a 1:1 with us by clicking here

New to Codefresh? Get started with Codefresh by signing up for an account today!
